description:
A very nice, albeit a little basic adaptation of the classic game by Gabriele Cirulli. Really smooth controls.
Some features I would love to see in the future would be 
- Custom colour schemes (only 2 avaible right now)
- High score system
- Saving games between sessions
- Undo 
I know some people would consider that last point cheating but I'm a casual

When I try to launch the game a terminal window opens that says "sh: 1: /usr/bin/2048: not found

PRESS ENTER TO EXIT"

The port is busted. /usr/bin/2048 not found...


latest ubuntu
